title: EVERYONE WHO IS PLAT OR GOLD PUT UR NAME DOWN HERE BECAUSE THERE ARE SO MANY OF YOU GUYS!!!
body: Alright let me first say that there are a lot of you guys out there saying LF team but can't be bothered making a team well fear not I am making one now let me first tell you a bit about me first thing is I am not going for the best punctuation thread ok so don't say anything just breathe when you need to second thing is that a kind friend gave me this account when it was bronze 5 and it had a horrible win rate my main was plat 5 on na but I feel I cannot climb because of high ping so I decide to start this account and I'm not far off it if u want to be apart of the team I need to know a bit about ya and then we can discuss other issues like Skype and goals and availability and stuff but ign current division role and champions are really key also if you haven't notice I main adc preferably vayne, graves and corki

replies.body: So you just admitted that you are account sharing?
